verses.verse: For the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of heaven <S%G3772><s%> is like <S%G3664><s%> to a man <S%G444><s%> that is an householder, <S%G3617><s%> which <S%G3748><s%> went <S%G1821><s%> out early <S%G260><s%> <S%G4404><s%> in the morning to hire <S%G3409><s%> laborers <S%G2040><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> his vineyard. <S%G290><s%>
And when he had agreed <S%G4856><s%> with the laborers <S%G2040><s%> for a penny <S%G1220><s%> a day, <S%G2250><s%> he sent <S%G649><s%> them into <S%G1519><s%> his vineyard. <S%G290><s%>

And he went <S%G1821><s%> out about <S%G4012><s%> the third <S%G5154><s%> hour, <S%G5610><s%> and saw <S%G1492><s%> others <S%G243><s%> standing <S%G2476><s%> idle <S%G692><s%> in the marketplace, <S%G58><s%>

And said <S%G2036><s%> to them; Go <S%G5217><s%> you also <S%G2532><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the vineyard, <S%G290><s%> and whatever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1437><s%> is right <S%G1342><s%> I will give you. And they went <S%G565><s%> their way.
Again <S%G3825><s%> he went <S%G1831><s%> out about <S%G4012><s%> the sixth <S%G1623><s%> and ninth <S%G1766><s%> hour, <S%G5610><s%> and did <S%G4160><s%> likewise. <S%G5615><s%>

And about <S%G4012><s%> the eleventh <S%G1734><s%> hour <S%G5610><s%> he went <S%G1831><s%> out, and found <S%G2147><s%> others <S%G243><s%> standing <S%G2476><s%> idle, <S%G692><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to them, Why <S%G5101><s%> stand <S%G2476><s%> you here <S%G5602><s%> all <S%G3650><s%> the day <S%G2250><s%> idle? <S%G692><s%>

They say <S%G3004><s%> to him, Because <S%G3754><s%> no <S%G3762><s%> man <S%G3762><s%> has hired <S%G3409><s%> us. He said <S%G3004><s%> to them, Go <S%G5217><s%> you also <S%G2532><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the vineyard; <S%G290><s%> and whatever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1437><s%> is right, <S%G1342><s%> that shall you receive. <S%G2983><s%>

So <S%G1161><s%> when even <S%G3798><s%> was come, <S%G1096><s%> the lord <S%G2962><s%> of the vineyard <S%G290><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to his steward, <S%G2012><s%> Call <S%G2564><s%> the laborers, <S%G2040><s%> and give <S%G591><s%> them their hire, <S%G3408><s%> beginning <S%G756><s%> from the last <S%G2078><s%> to the first. <S%G4413><s%>

And when they came <S%G2064><s%> that were hired <S%G3409><s%> about <S%G4012><s%> the eleventh <S%G1734><s%> hour, <S%G5610><s%> they received <S%G2983><s%> every <S%G303><s%> man a penny. <S%G1220><s%>

But when the first <S%G4413><s%> came, <S%G2064><s%> they supposed <S%G3543><s%> that they should have received <S%G2983><s%> more; <S%G4119><s%> and they likewise <S%G2532><s%> received <S%G2983><s%> every <S%G303><s%> man a penny. <S%G1220><s%>
And when they had received <S%G2983><s%> it, they murmured <S%G1111><s%> against <S%G2596><s%> the manager <S%G3611><s%> of the house, <S%G3617><s%>

Saying, <S%G3004><s%> These <S%G3778><s%> last <S%G2078><s%> have worked <S%G4160><s%> but one <S%G3391><s%> hour, <S%G5610><s%> and you have made <S%G4160><s%> them equal <S%G2470><s%> to us, which <S%G3588><s%> have borne <S%G941><s%> the burden <S%G922><s%> and heat <S%G2742><s%> of the day. <S%G2250><s%>

But he answered <S%G611><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of them, and said, <S%G2036><s%> Friend, <S%G2083><s%> I do <S%G91><s%> you no <S%G3756><s%> wrong: <S%G91><s%> did not you agree <S%G4856><s%> with me for a penny? <S%G1220><s%>
Take <S%G142><s%> that your <S%G4674><s%> is, and go <S%G5217><s%> your way: I will <S%G2309><s%> give <S%G1325><s%> to this <S%G5129><s%> last, <S%G2078><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> as to you.

Is it not lawful <S%G1832><s%> for me to do <S%G4160><s%> what <S%G3739><s%> I will <S%G2309><s%> with my <S%G1699><s%> own? Is your <S%G4675><s%> eye <S%G3788><s%> evil, <S%G4190><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> I am <S%G1510><s%> good? <S%G18><s%>

So <S%G3779><s%> the last <S%G2078><s%> shall be first, <S%G4413><s%> and the first <S%G4413><s%> last: <S%G2078><s%> for many <S%G4183><s%> be called, <S%G2822><s%> but few <S%G3641><s%> chosen. <S%G1588><s%>

And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> going <S%G305><s%> up to Jerusalem <S%G2414><s%> took <S%G3880><s%> the twelve <S%G1427><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> apart <S%G2596><s%> <S%G2398><s%> in the way, <S%G3598><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> to them,

Behold, <S%G2400><s%> we go <S%G305><s%> up to Jerusalem; <S%G2414><s%> and the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> shall be betrayed <S%G3860><s%> to the chief <S%G749><s%> priests <S%G749><s%> and to the scribes, <S%G1122><s%> and they shall condemn <S%G2632><s%> him to death, <S%G2288><s%>

And shall deliver <S%G3860><s%> him to the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%> to mock, <S%G1702><s%> and to whip, <S%G3146><s%> and to crucify <S%G4717><s%> him: and the third <S%G5154><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> he shall rise <S%G450><s%> again. <S%G450><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> came <S%G4334><s%> to him the mother <S%G3384><s%> of Zebedees <S%G2199><s%> children <S%G5207><s%> with her sons, <S%G5207><s%> worshipping <S%G4352><s%> him, and desiring <S%G154><s%> a certain <S%G5100><s%> thing of him.

And he said <S%G2036><s%> to her, What <S%G5101><s%> will <S%G2309><s%> you? She said <S%G3004><s%> to him, Grant <S%G2036><s%> that these <S%G3778><s%> my two <S%G1417><s%> sons <S%G5207><s%> may sit, <S%G2523><s%> the one <S%G1520><s%> on <S%G1537><s%> your right <S%G1188><s%> hand, and the other <S%G1520><s%> on <S%G1537><s%> the left, <S%G2176><s%> in your kingdom. <S%G932><s%>

But Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said, <S%G2036><s%> You know <S%G1492><s%> not what <S%G5101><s%> you ask. <S%G154><s%> Are you able <S%G1410><s%> to drink <S%G4095><s%> of the cup <S%G4221><s%> that I shall drink <S%G4095><s%> of, and to be baptized <S%G907><s%> with the baptism <S%G908><s%> that I am baptized <S%G907><s%> with? They say <S%G3004><s%> to him, We are able. <S%G1410><s%>

And he said <S%G3004><s%> to them, You shall drink <S%G4095><s%> indeed <S%G3303><s%> of my cup, <S%G4221><s%> and be baptized <S%G907><s%> with the baptism <S%G908><s%> that I am baptized <S%G907><s%> with: but to sit <S%G2523><s%> on <S%G1537><s%> my right <S%G1188><s%> hand, and on <S%G1537><s%> my left, <S%G2176><s%> is not my <S%G1699><s%> to give, <S%G1325><s%> but it shall be given to them for whom <S%G3739><s%> it is prepared <S%G2090><s%> of my Father. <S%G3962><s%>
And when the ten <S%G1176><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> it, they were moved <S%G23><s%> with indignation <S%G23><s%> against <S%G4012><s%> the two <S%G1417><s%> brothers. <S%G80><s%>

But Jesus <S%G2424><s%> called <S%G4341><s%> them to him, and said, <S%G2036><s%> You know <S%G1492><s%> that the princes <S%G758><s%> of the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%> exercise <S%G2634><s%> dominion <S%G2634><s%> over them, and they that are great <S%G3171><s%> exercise <S%G2715><s%> authority <S%G2715><s%> on them.

But it shall not be so <S%G3779><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> you: but whoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1437><s%> will <S%G2309><s%> be great <S%G3173><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> you, let him be your <S%G5216><s%> minister; <S%G1249><s%>
And whoever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1437><s%> will <S%G2309><s%> be chief <S%G4413><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> you, let him be your <S%G5216><s%> servant: <S%G1401><s%>

Even <S%G5618><s%> as the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> not to be ministered <S%G1247><s%> to, but to minister, <S%G1247><s%> and to give <S%G1325><s%> his life <S%G5590><s%> a ransom <S%G3083><s%> for many. <S%G4183><s%>
And as they departed <S%G1607><s%> from Jericho, <S%G2410><s%> a great <S%G4183><s%> multitude <S%G3793><s%> followed <S%G190><s%> him.

And, behold, <S%G2400><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> blind <S%G5185><s%> men sitting <S%G2521><s%> by the way <S%G3598><s%> side, <S%G3844><s%> when they heard <S%G191><s%> that Jesus <S%G2424><s%> passed <S%G3855><s%> by, cried <S%G2896><s%> out, saying, <S%G3004><s%> Have mercy <S%G1653><s%> on us, O Lord, <S%G2962><s%> you son <S%G5207><s%> of David. <S%G1138><s%>

And the multitude <S%G3793><s%> rebuked <S%G2008><s%> them, because <S%G2443><s%> they should hold <S%G4623><s%> their peace: <S%G4623><s%> but they cried <S%G2896><s%> the more, <S%G3185><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> Have mercy <S%G1653><s%> on us, O Lord, <S%G2962><s%> you son <S%G5207><s%> of David. <S%G1138><s%>
And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> stood <S%G2476><s%> still, <S%G2476><s%> and called <S%G5455><s%> them, and said, <S%G2036><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> will <S%G2309><s%> you that I shall do <S%G4160><s%> to you?
They say <S%G3004><s%> to him, Lord, <S%G2962><s%> that our eyes <S%G3788><s%> may be opened. <S%G455><s%>

So <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> had compassion <S%G4697><s%> on them, and touched <S%G680><s%> their eyes: <S%G3788><s%> and immediately <S%G2112><s%> their eyes <S%G3788><s%> received <S%G308><s%> sight, <S%G308><s%> and they followed <S%G190><s%> him.
